arcade.env.grid

Class RectAgentGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.env.grid.AgentGrid
      • arcade.env.grid.RectAgentGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Grid

    public class RectAgentGrid
extends AgentGrid
    Extension of AgentGrid for rectangular grid.

    Each rectangular location has four positions. Uses RectLocation as Location object.

    Since:
    2.3
    Version:
    2.3.2
